document_data.title: Kandlekeep Dekonstruktion
document_data.author:
[[Amy Vorpahl]]
'''Credited as developer:'''
[[Christopher Perkins]]
document_data.mainbody:
'''"Kandlekeep Dekonstruktion"''' is a short adventure module for 9{{th}}–level players, collected in the anthology ''[[Candlekeep Mysteries]]'', where players try to stop cultists from launching one of [[Candlekeep]]'s towers into space.
{{TOC limit|2}}
document_data.Synopsis: In [[1492 DR]], a group of [[adventurer]]s in Candlekeep witness an elderly acolyte dying from a heart attack as he is carrying around a tome containing plans for the [[Barn Door]], a tower in the restricted areas of the fortress library. Further investigation reveals that a cult of disgruntled Candlekeep custodians, the [[Livestock]], are planning to launch the tower into space using [[rocket]]s. The adventurers must race against time to stop the custodian cultists from absconding with Candlekeep's treasured books.
